name: Superbreakn
description:
Hank breaks into your house to kill you, and you are not alone.

No WebGL due to heavy performance, and no support for compute shaders.

Will publish source code later, when I can clean up the project.

Controls:

Move with WASD.

Crouch with Left Ctrl.

Sprint with Left Shift.

Jump with Space.

Switch guns with the mouse wheel.

Reload with R.

Shoot with LMB.

Aim with RMB.

Toggle flashlight with F.

Toggle scope with MMB.

Toggle silencer with X.

Ctrl + Alt + I - Frame counter.

Ctrl + Alt + O - Frame counter mode.

Esc - Pause.
